data.name: 01 SharePoint Modern legibility
data.description: SharePoint Modern has poor typography which decreases its readability and hurts users. This primarily restores font weights which increases contrast, and makes the structure of the document more apparent through headings.

data.name: Coggle Remove Coogle logo from back button
data.description: Coggle mind map does not allows to remove its logo from the "back" button even in the paid version. if you are screen recording and do not want the logo, just use this very small css to remove the coggle logo.
